Title: Sagamu crash: Anthony Joshua lauds family, friends for support
Summary: Anthony Joshua has expressed gratitude to family and friends for their support towards his two late friends, AbdulLateef Ayodele and Sina Ghami . In a touching tribute shared on his X account on Thursday, the British-Nigerian fighter lauds family, friends for support .

Title: NSCDC decorates 113 senior officers, warns against lobbying for postings
Summary: The Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC) has decorated 113 officers promoted from Deputy Commandant of Corps (DCC) to Commandant . The Commandant-General of NSCDC, Dr Ahmed Audi, decorated the officers on Thursday at the corps’ headquarters .

Title: Residents appeal to political leaders to rethink impeachment move
Summary: Residents of Rivers State decry growing political instability in the state . They say renewed impeachment move against Governor Siminalayi Fubara signals further retrogression . The concerns followed the initiation of fresh impeachment proceedings against the governor .

Title: Police confirm death of notorious bandit in Benue
Summary: Terkaa Samuel of Jandekyula, Wukari Local Government Area of Taraba was killed . The Command’s Spokesperson, DSP Udeme Edet, stated this in a statement on Thursday .

Title: Man arrested in Edo for alleged abduction of four-year-old
Summary: A 21-year-old man, ThankGod Destiny, has been arrested by the Edo State Security Corps (ESSC) for allegedly abducting a four-year old boy in the state . Deputy Corps Commander, Operations, Richard Balogun, disclosed this to journalists .

Title: Lagos Assembly passes ₦4.4trn 2026 ‘Budget of Shared Prosperity’ into law
Summary: Lagos State House of Assembly has passed the ‘Budget of Shared Prosperity’ into law . Lagos Assembly passed the ₦4.4 trillion 2026 Appropriation Bill into law following extensive deliberations and sector-by-sector reviews .

Title: Man ‘livestreams his own death’ in extreme online challenge
Summary: A Spanish streamer has died while performing a dangerous live challenge involving cocaine and alcohol for a private group of paying subscribers . The challenge was performed by a man who 'livestreams his own death' in extreme online challenge .

Title: Fubara Impeachment: ADC monitoring Rivers crisis, yet to take position – Spokesman
Summary: The African Democratic Congress (ADC) says it is closely monitoring unfolding political developments in Rivers State . It is yet to take a definitive position on the impeachment process initiated against Governor Siminalayi Fubara .

Title: ‘Mr Bitter Peter’  —  Onanuga mocks Obi over comment on Super Eagles’ bonuses
Summary: Obi had described the development as an embarrassment to the country . He had described it as the failure to meet agreed obligations to the players . Onanuga mocks Obi over comment on Super Eagles’ bonuses .

Title: Nigerian man arrested in Canada over murder of varsity student
Summary: Nigerian man arrested in Canada over murder of varsity student . Police have arrested a 28-year-old man in connection with the killing of a university student .
